subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey, who has been altering the angles and heights of his release point to better control his knuckleball, struck out 10 in a 2-0 Mets win over San Diego.
snippet: R. A. Dickey, who has been altering the angles and heights of his release point to better control his knuckleball, struck out 10 in a 2-0 Mets win over San Diego.
